meanings.definition: Two or more publishers who jointly publish a book or other work.
meanings.sent1: The copublishers worked together to release the new novel.
meanings.sent2: The copublishers collaborated on the production of the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The copublishers decided to team up and print the comic book together.
meanings.sent4: The copublishers joined forces to bring the educational materials to schools.
meanings.sent5: The copublishers shared the responsibility of launching the poetry collection.
